page.title: 15EATING OUT IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: There are several places to eat out from a take away fish & chip shop to a high class restaurant. {HOTELS:}Holly Lodge, The Swan, The Old Vicarage. They have restaurants and cater for special occasions such as wedding receptions. { {PUBLIC HOUSES: }The Red Lion, The George & Dragon. Bar meals. {RESTAURANTS:}All licensed _ Berni Inn (Good Companions), The Idle Hour, The Old Vicarage and Bistro 33 who cater for special occasions also. {CAFES:}Bistro 33 sells snack meals as well as sandwiches and cakes to take away. {TAKE_AWAYS: }1 fish and chip shop. {FOREIGN RESTAURANTS:}None. The nearest are 3/4 miles away. {CHILDREN:}Welcome at The Swan, Berni Inn, Holly Lodge for meals.
